titleStmt.title: Green L. Brown to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2108

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Newhaven June 23/65
Mr Thomas E Bramlet Govern of Ky

Sir my place of Residence when at home is in casey clounty Ky I am now in the State service in capt Logan Co under colonel Adams before I Enlisted I was serving in Casey County in Jenkins pre precinct as one of the Justice of the pease my time would or been out Last may up two years from Last may I now say to you I cant serve any Longer and I want you to order that an lection as soon as possable for the purpose of a lection a man to fill out my plase. So no more But Remains yours

Lt. Green L. Brown
State vols cavl

Justice Peace
Casey Co
G. L. Brown
Resignation
accepted
29 June/65
Accept Resignation
